    Function reference

    All functions

    abcd_test_data
    ABCD test data
    activity_units
    Units for economic activities per sector and technology
    aggregate_alignment_loanbook_exposure()
    Return loan book level aggregation of company alignment metrics by exposure
    calculate_company_aggregate_alignment_sda()
    Return company level sector alignment metric for each company
    calculate_company_aggregate_alignment_tms()
    Return company level sector alignment metric for each company with option to disaggregate by buildout / phaseout.
    calculate_company_tech_deviation()
    Return company level technology deviations for TMS sectors. To be used as input into calculation of company level aggregate alignment metrics for production trajectory sectors.
    create_benchmark_loanbook()
    Return raw loan book containing the corporate economy benchmark
    loanbook_test_data
    Loan book test data
    plot_sankey()
    Make a sankey plot
    plot_scatter()
    Plot alignment scatterplot
    plot_scatter_animated()
    Plot alignment scatterplot
    plot_timeline()
    Plot alignment timeline
    prep_sankey()
    Prepare data to plot using plot_sankey()
    prep_scatter()
    Prepare data to plot scatterplot
    prep_scatter_animated()
    Prepare data to plot animated scatterplot
    prep_timeline()
    Prepare data to plot timeline
    validate_data_has_expected_cols()
    Validate that a data frame contains expected columns
